meta.title: RC Cup Team Template | Terms
meta.description: Terms and conditions for sponsors and team policies.

hero.title: Sponsorship terms
hero.lead: Clear agreements keep the project healthy and fair.

sections.title: General
items: Sponsors receive visibility as listed in the package.
Payments can be cash or material support.
Logos must be provided in the required format.

sections.title: Brand use
items: We use sponsor logos only for team promotion.
Major changes will be shared in advance.
Sponsors may request removal after the season.

sections.title: Data and privacy
items: Contact data is only used for sponsor communication.
We do not share sponsor data with third parties.
